sentence: That is the object lesson of Representative Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina, the House's youngest member, whose bid for a second term is in jeopardy after a series of incendiary statements and personal foibles have soured many former supporters.
title: House Republicans Tire of Madison Cawthorn's Antics. Some in His District Have, Too.

sentence: Other attendees of the fundraiser on Wednesday include Congressmen Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina and Jim Jordan of Ohio.
author: Aaron Navarro
title: Over 50 House Republicans attend fundraiser for Liz Cheney's challenger, Harriet Hageman
